channel.title: Adding a timer to something?

item.title: Adding a timer to something?
item.dc:creator: @ta1nt3d ta1nt3d
item.description:
@ta1nt3d wrote:

how would i go about knowing if my event manager is “fixed” also how would i go about adding the timer there im somewhat new and still learning

my question is what would i put in event manager?

or what are the alternatives to adding a timer to the potion
is there no possible way i could add a simple timer in my potions.java?

thanks for your time

Read full topic

item.title: Adding a timer to something?
item.dc:creator: @ta1nt3d ta1nt3d
item.description:
@ta1nt3d wrote:

this is probably super easy but considering im somewhat new to coding i figured i should ask before i give up lol

i have this potion i use for special restore pots

here is the code from my potions.java

case 10925://sanfew serums if (c.inWild() || c.specRestore > 0) return; drinkPrayerPot(itemId,10927,slot,true); c.specRestore = 2; c.specAmount = 10.0; c.getItems().addSpecialBar(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]); c.sendMessage("Your special attack has been restored.");
how would i add a 60 second timer so that you could only use the potion effect every 60 seconds

would it be something like System.currentTimeMillis();?

Read full topic
